column4: hey guys...can I get some advice about twinview...at the moment (within nVidia settings) I have twinview setup...when I maximise a window, it maximises to both windows...how can I set a window to only maximise to the monitor it is sitting in?
anyone please help on twinview?
have some patience. If someone knows the answer, they will reply. If not, retry in ten to fifteen minutes.
you asked a good question before. Now you've asked a poor one.
I'm giving you good advice about how to make use of IRC, which is to ask your original question again.
trust me, I know which type of question attracts responses. The frustrated ones don't.
there are instructions for how to set up twinview via xorg.conf in /usr/share/doc/nvidia-glx/README.txt.gz
maybe the issue with nvidia-settings not sticking is a permissions thing -- do you start it with gksudo?
also, see in /etc/X11/ whether there are files other than xorg.conf which might be in use in its place
